cyclone.name: IRMA
cyclone.current_location: about 65 mi (100 km) E of Varadero, Cuba and 145 mi (235 km) SE of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to turn northwest later today, then north-northwest on Sunday, moving through the Florida Keys and along the southwest coast of Florida

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Keys, southwest and west-central Florida coast, and later the southeast United States coast up through South Carolina
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-cyclone-related winds expected; Irmaâ€™s core and wind field are far west of St. Croix
